Label.en: In 1799, during Napoleon’s expedition to Egypt, some soldiers found the stone amongst some other rocks while fortifying their camp, based here!
Label.fr: In 1799, during Napoleon’s expedition to Egypt, some soldiers found the stone amongst some other rocks while fortifying their camp, based here!
Label.es: In 1799, during Napoleon’s expedition to Egypt, some soldiers found the stone amongst some other rocks while fortifying their camp, based here!

Label.en: Before that, we think it was used as a regular block in a Medieval Egyptian fort!
Label.fr: Before that, we think it was used as a regular block in a Medieval Egyptian fort!
Label.es: Before that, we think it was used as a regular block in a Medieval Egyptian fort!

Label.en: The soldiers quickly notified their bosses, realising it was important!
Label.fr: The soldiers quickly notified their bosses, realising it was important!
Label.es: The soldiers quickly notified their bosses, realising it was important!

Label.en: While they were planning to move the stone to France, the French were defeated in battle by the British at Alexandria!
Label.fr: While they were planning to move the stone to France, the French were defeated in battle by the British at Alexandria!
Label.es: While they were planning to move the stone to France, the French were defeated in battle by the British at Alexandria!

Label.en: But the French reaaaaally didn’t want to hand over all their precious artefacts, and there were many arguments
Label.fr: But the French reaaaaally didn’t want to hand over all their precious artefacts, and there were many arguments
Label.es: But the French reaaaaally didn’t want to hand over all their precious artefacts, and there were many arguments
